imdb.plot outline: 'Ultimate Fan Access' gives one artist's biggest fan the opportunity to meet & interview their favourite country music superstar! The ultimate fan also gets spending money, flown to a city in the US or Canada & great tickets to watch their favourite artist perform in concert! Episodes have included Taylor Swift, Carrie Underwood & Tim McGraw!
imdb.title: Ultimate Fan Access
